text: Eva Marcille is in a great space right now. The America ’ s Next Top Model winner and proud mother of one is happily engaged to former Atlanta mayoral candidate, Michael Sterling, and is glowingly expecting her second child, first with Sterling. In a new interview with Essence, Marcille shared that she and the popular attorney have decided to wed in the city where they fell in love. “ We fell in love with each other in Atlanta, ” the 33 - year - old revealed. “ We met in Atlanta and fell in love in Atlanta.
